intro: Psychotria gardneri var. jayasuriyae, commonly known as the Jayasuriyae Psychotria, is a flowering plant belonging to the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Southeast Asia, particularly found in parts of Thailand and Malaysia. The plant is characterized by its elliptical, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in lowland rainforests. The species is notable for its ornamental value and has been studied for its potential pharmacological properties.
